title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Spark curiosity and power up playtime with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit—an award-winning STEM adventure for young inventors. Perfect for Grades 3–6 and ages 8+, this hands-on kit turns complex concepts into “aha!” moments through 25 guided experiments that make science feel like magic.

What kids will love:
- Build and see inside: A transparent electric motor lets kids watch electricity turn into motion in real time.
- Flip the script: Reconfigure the setup into a hand-crank generator to convert motion back into electricity.
- Make it move: Experiment with magnets, build simple circuits, and explore gears and drive trains to understand how machines work.

What parents and educators will appreciate:
- Structured learning: A 48-page full-color student guide plus a 60-page illustrated manual provide clear, step-by-step lessons.
- Real STEM outcomes: Kids grasp magnetic fields, electric current, and energy conversion (kinetic to electrical and electrical to kinetic).
- Recognized quality: Parents’ Choice Silver Award winner for outstanding educational value and engagement.

Designed for curious minds and busy hands, this compact kit (13.1" x 8.9" x 2.6", 1.3 lbs) blends discovery with durable components for repeatable experiments and long-lasting learning. Whether for classroom enrichment, homeschool labs, or weekend tinkering, the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit turns STEM fundamentals into thrilling, do-it-yourself discoveries. Power up their potential—one experiment at a time.
